charities.name: Doctors Without Borders (MSF)
charities.description: Delivers emergency medical care to people affected by conflict, epidemics, disasters, and exclusion from healthcare. Operates in over 70 countries worldwide.

charities.name: International Rescue Committee (IRC)
charities.description: Responds to the world's worst humanitarian crises, helping people survive, recover, and rebuild their lives. Works in 40+ countries and 29 U.S. cities.

charities.name: UNICEF USA
charities.description: Works in 190+ countries to protect children's rights, help meet their basic needs, and expand opportunities for them to reach their full potential.

charities.name: All Hands and Hearts
charities.description: Effectively and efficiently addresses immediate and long-term needs of communities impacted by natural disasters. Mobilizes volunteers worldwide.

charities.name: World Food Programme USA
charities.description: The world's largest humanitarian organization, saving lives in emergencies and using food assistance to build pathways to peace and stability.

charities.name: ShelterBox USA
charities.description: Provides emergency shelter and essential supplies to families who have lost their homes to disaster or conflict. Has helped 2.5 million people since 2000.

charities.name: CARE
charities.description: Fights global poverty with special focus on working alongside women and girls. Reached 174 million people in 104 countries last year.

charities.name: Direct Relief
charities.description: Improves health and lives of people affected by poverty or emergencies. Provides medical resources to locally-run health facilities worldwide.

charities.name: Refugees International
charities.description: Advocates for lifesaving assistance and protection for displaced people and promotes solutions to displacement crises around the world.

charities.name: Mercy Corps
charities.description: Empowers people to survive through crisis, build better lives, and transform their communities for good. Reaches 53+ million people annually.

charities.name: Action Against Hunger
charities.description: A global humanitarian organization committed to ending world hunger. Reaches 28 million people each year across nearly 50 countries.

charities.name: Catholic Relief Services
charities.description: Carries out the commitment of the Bishops of the United States to assist the poor and vulnerable overseas. Works in 100+ countries.

charities.name: GlobalGiving
charities.description: Connects nonprofits, donors, and companies in nearly every country. Has raised over $700 million for grassroots projects worldwide.

charities.name: International Medical Corps
charities.description: Delivers emergency medical and related services to those affected by conflict, disaster and disease, no matter where they are.

charities.name: Save the Children
charities.description: Works in 100+ countries to give children a healthy start, opportunity to learn, and protection from harm. Responds to major emergencies.

charities.name: Oxfam America
charities.description: Fights inequality to defeat poverty and injustice. Works in more than 90 countries with partners and communities.
